args:
Zombies surround the Halidom, but Akasha
knows both what they are and of the grimoire
controlling them. When Melsa notices that they
hesitate to attack her in her zombie costume,
she sees a chance to break through.
Some hours after the zombie assault began...
Most of them followed the prince\ninto the woods.
But there's still a small army outside.\nThankfully, they don't seem to be in\nany rush to get in here.
Are the zombies gonna eat us?
Don't you worry! All the doors and windows\nare shut, and the castle's built real tough.
Plus you have us to keep you safe\nuntil the prince gets back.
(However long that takes...\nWe must hold the line here!)
Deluded fools! We mortals will find our\nbitter end at the gnashing jaws of the\ngrim and implacable dead!
The floodgates of hell are burst! The world\nof the living will face a black dawn twenty-\neight days hence! Death reigns supreme!
How the devil am I supposed to do that?\nAt least keeping my hands moving is a\ndistraction from this nightmare!
I knew you'd say that, boss, so I went and\nfound some iron pipe we can forge.
This belongs to Edward!\nWe really shouldn't just take it...
Yeah, my bad. Found me this rare-looking\npyroblossom and couldn't help m'self.
Please do NOT help yourself in the future!\nThose are no toys, sir!
Everyone's fears and frustrations are\nbuilding into a full-blown panic.
THE ZOMBIES HEARD THE BLAST THEY'RE\nPOUNDING AT THE WALLS WE'RE ALL\nGOING TO DIIIIIIIIE!
It's all right, child. We're safe here.\nThey'll give up and go away soon enough.
...Phew! Sounds like they DID give up.
Still, my heart is going to give out\nif this keeps up much longer.
People are freakin' out because there's no\nleader around. Well, I'm about to fix that!
You! Sylvan chick! This here's the first\norder from yer new leader: Bring me all\nthe food you got in this place!
Those provisions belong to all, sir.
My bro is HUNGRY, lady! Get him some\nchow or you're gonna regret it!
Threaten me all you like, but those\nprovisions will stay locked away.

She's got fire, this one! Looks like it's
time for teach to teach a lesson to the...
uh...student of... Yeah, sorta lost the
thread there. Whatever! Gimme the food!
Inadvisable, gentlemen. History holds no\nexample of rule by violence succeeding.
You want a piece of me, lady?\n'Cause I got PLENTY'A pieces to go around!
You will refrain from touching so much\nas a crumb of the food in this castle.\nAre we perfectly clear?
Yes, Lady Akasha. Whatever you command,\nLady Akasha.
I didn't see you earlier.\nWhat have you been up to?
Just conducting a bit of research\nthat has born fruit MOST succulent.

First, the zombies' origin: They are not
soldiers of the Empire that we know.
Instead, they hail from a land that fought
and fell some three centuries ago.
These guys are three hundred years old?!
That means they were alive during the\nSecond War of Binding and were defeated\nby King Alberius's forces.
You think they've come back for revenge?
No. Their attack is the will of the\ngrimoire bearer alone.
The ＂Legion Immortalis＂—a forbidden text\nthat summons the dead and binds them to\nthe caster's will.
Yeah! That creep at the lake read a weird\nbook and those zombies started sprouting\nfrom the ground! He gave them orders!
That lakeside was like a battlefield three\nhundred years ago, and now the caster has\nset those war-dead upon the Halidom.
So if we can take that grimoire from him,\ncan we stop the zombies?!
A fine idea, provided we are able to reach\nthe lakeside where the caster resides.
Hmm, that might be tough. The whole\narea's swarming with zombies.
Oh no! The shiny-headed guy and his\nmohawk friend jumped out a window!
You've GOT to be kidding me.
They said if they can't have any food,\nthey're gonna go eat up the candy\ncottage outside.
An unfortunate oversight on my part.\nI should have been more specific in the\nglamour I cast upon them.
Those fools are in actual danger.\nWe have to get them back inside.
Quick, while the coast's clear, bro!\nLet's chow down on this thing!
*homf* *nom* *chomp* Bro! BRO!\nThis marshmallow mortar is amazing!
Can it! I'm having a special moment\nwith this chocolate brick wall.
Rgh. I SAID not to bother m... NWAUGH?!
Wh-when did these things surround us?!\nStupid monsters! Rragh!
Th-they're not stopping! Noooo! I don't\nwanna end up as a zombie snack!
To save your dumb butts, obviously!
Huh? Why aren't they attacking?\nIt's like they're confused.
(They never hesitated when attacking\nanyone else, so why me?)
Bullseye, straight to the head!\nYou all good, Melsa?!
Yes! Now let's use this chance\nto get back inside!
You guys coulda saved us a little\nfaster, ya know...
Perhaps these gentlemen's evening of\nextortion and ingratitude might best have\nended in a zombie's gullet.
I'm not letting anyone get eaten,\neven if they ARE a huge jerk.
Forget them. I have an idea...
